about_the_game:
The Digital Art Book of Mysteria~Occult Shadows~.
This contains character design sketches, unadopted CGs and illustrations and hand drew concept pictures from the early stage of development.
You can check the pictures in the DLC under the folder DLC_Art in the root folder of Mysteria after downloading it.
